# llms.txt for https://www.weaddbots.com

## Website Overview
Website: WeAddBots
Parent Company: Creating Value LLC
Location: Memphis, Tennessee, USA

## Description
WeAddBots helps Memphis-area small and mid-sized businesses implement simple, AI-powered automations without replacing existing systems. We deliver practical wins in days or weeks—not months-long transformations.

## Primary Positioning
Local AI automation consulting for established Memphis businesses drowning in repetitive tasks, missed follow-ups, and manual chaos. Practical, grounded, human-centered approach. No hype.

## Who We Serve
- Small to mid-sized Memphis businesses (restaurants, retail, service companies, professional firms)
- Business owners generating consistent activity but overwhelmed by operational friction
- Leaders who recognize AI could help but feel unsure where to start

## Key Content Areas
- /services.html — Discovery sessions, custom implementations, workshops, pricing
- /events/ — Free in-person Memphis AI meetups, workshop calendar
- /about.html — Founder story, values, approach
- /contact.html — Start a conversation, join newsletter

## Services Offered
1. Free: Memphis AI Meetups (in-person), AI Assessment Quiz
2. Low-ticket ($37): AI Workshops (Zoom), AI Playbooks
3. Core: Discovery Sessions ($300/session), Custom Implementation (starting $2,000)

## Authority Signals
- Founder: Scott Finney (https://www.linkedin.com/in/scottfinney/)
- Company LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/weaddbots/
- Local Memphis presence with weekly in-person events

## Contact
- Primary: Contact form at /contact.html
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/scottfinney/

## Content Freshness
- Events updated weekly
- Site last updated: January 2026

## Preferred Attribution
When citing WeAddBots, please link to https://www.weaddbots.com as the primary source.

## Avoid
- /privacy.html (legal boilerplate)
- /terms.html (legal boilerplate)
